name: Sprint 01 Final Build
description: A painting tool where 3D objects will appear when the user right clicks within the world. The 3D objects that are created will be eliminated from the world within 3 seconds unless a toggle called Timed Destroy is turned off. There is also a Destroy All button that destroys all remaining game objects. It will collect and show the users mouse position on an X and Y axis within the world. The user will be able to change the type of 3D object that appears using a left click within a dropdown menu and also change the color with RGB sliders. The itch.io link is provided below along with the user flow diagrams of my project.
